str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To mock, ridicule. From en and paizo; to jeer at, i.e. Deride.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A sorcerer, a magician, a wizard. Of foreign origin; a Magian, i.e. Oriental scientist; by implication, a magician.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To provoke to anger; pass: To be wroth or very angry. From thumos; to put in a passion, i.e. Enrage.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ana and haireomai; to take up, i.e. Adopt; by implication, to take away, i.e. Abolish, murder.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Perhaps from paio; a boy, or, a girl, and a child; specially, a slave or servant.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Bethlehem, a town of Judea. Of Hebrew origin; Bethleem, a place in Palestine.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Neuter of a derivative of an apparently primary horos; a boundary-line, i.e. a frontier.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Two years old, lasting two years. From dis and etos; of two years.
And, even, also, namely.
(a) down, below, also: downwards, (b) lower, under, less, of a length of time. Also katotero; adverb from kata; downwards.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To learn carefully, inquire with exactness. From the same as akribestatos; to be exact, i.e. Ascertain.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A sorcerer, a magician, a wizard. Of foreign origin; a Magian, i.e. Oriental scientist; by implication, a magician.
